scripts.init-db: AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=accessKeyId AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=secretAccessKey aws dynamodb create-table --table-name Reminders --key-schema AttributeName=id,KeyType=HASH --attribute-definitions AttributeName=id,AttributeType=S --provisioned-throughput ReadCapacityUnits=5,WriteCapacityUnits=5 --endpoint-url http://localhost:8000 --region eu-north-1
scripts.start: DYNAMO_ENDPOINT=http://localhost:8000 AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=accessKeyId AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=secretAccessKey sudo -E sam local start-api
